code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const projects=[{title:'Portfolio Website',description:'A personal website to showcase my work and skills.',link:'#'},{title:'Weather App',description:'Built with React and OpenWeatherMap API to display real-time weather.',link:'#'},{title:'Task Manager',description:'A full-stack MERN app to manage daily tasks and priorities.',link:'#'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"projects",className:"py-20 bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 px-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-5xl mx-auto text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold mb-10",children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid gap-8 md:grid-cols-2",children:projects.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white shadow-md rounded-lg p-6 hover:shadow-xl transition",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-2",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600 mb-4",children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.link,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"text-teal-500 hover:underline",children:"View Project \u2192"})]},index))})]})});};export default Projects;
